item.title: Marko Ivanković
item.description: Master of Engineering mit 10 Jahren Erfahrung in der Branche. Expert für Software-Engineering. Berufliche Erfahrungen Senior Staff Software Engineer bei Google (2020. - derzeit) Staff Software Engineer bei Google (2016. - 2020.) Senior Software Engineer, Tools and Infrastructure bei Google (2014. - 2016.) Software Engineer, Tools and Infrastructure bei Google (2011. - 2014.) Intern, Software Engineer bei Google (2010.) IOI 2007 - Evaluationskomitet (2007.) Croatian Open Competition in Informatics - Wisschenschaftskomitet (2007.
